name: Introduction to Media Studies
description: This is a basic course introducing students to the fundamentals of media studies and its history.

name: Basics of Media Production
description: This course introduces students to the basics of media production, including the principles of sound and video recording, editing, and post-production.

name: Advanced Media Production
description: This course builds on the basics of media production, introducing students to more advanced concepts and techniques.

name: Digital Media Production
description: This course teaches students the fundamentals of digital media production, including the principles of digital audio and video recording, editing, and post-production.

name: Advanced Digital Media Production
description: This course builds on the basics of digital media production, introducing students to more advanced concepts and techniques.
